sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choose, select, elect, pick, prefer, opt
means: choose ： 普通用词，侧重根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行选择，着重被选者的优点。
select ： 书面用词，具有庄严、正式的感情色彩。强调精选。
elect ： 指按照一定的规章或法律，用投票等方式进行的认真慎重的选择。
pick ： 口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含任意挑选之意。
prefer ： 强调个人偏爱，不一定有选择的行动。
opt ： 多指在几种可能性之间进行选择。

jx.jx_en_mean: To choose players and form sides or teams for a game, such as baseball or softball.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 选球员组队：在棒球或软式棒球等运动中挑选队员组成两方或两队

phrase.cizu_name: there is little (或 nothing) to choose between

jx.jx_en_mean: there is little or no difference between

entry.def: If you choose someone or something from several people or things that are available, you decide which person or thing you want to have.

example.ex: They will be able to choose their own leaders in democratic elections...
example.tran: 他们将能够通过民主选举选择自己的领导人。

example.ex: This week he has chosen Peter Mandelson to replace Mo Mowlam...
example.tran: 本周他选择了彼得·曼德尔森来代替莫·摩兰姆。

entry.def: If you choose to do something, you do it because you want to or because you feel that it is right.

example.ex: They knew that discrimination was going on, but chose to ignore it...
example.tran: 他们当时知道歧视现象仍然存在，但是宁愿装聋作哑。

example.ex: You can just take out the interest each year, if you choose.
example.tran: 你要是愿意，每年可以仅支取利息。

entry.def: If there is little to choose between people or things or nothing to choose between them, it is difficult to decide which is better or more suitable.

example.ex: There is very little to choose between the world's top tennis players.
example.tran: 世界顶级网球运动员之间往往难分伯仲。

entry.def: The chosen few are a small group who are treated better than other people. You sometimes use this expression when you think this is unfair.
entry.tran: 享受优厚待遇的少数人；精英

example.ex: Learning should no longer be an elitist pastime for the chosen few.
example.tran: 学习不应再是少数人的高级消遣。

means.word_mean: 1. pick out, select, or choose from a number of alternatives;

sentences.sentence: "Choose a good husband for your daughter"
"She selected a pair of shoes from among the dozen the salesgirl had shown her"

means.word_mean: 2. select as an alternative; choose instead; prefer as an alternative;

sentences.sentence: "I always choose the fish over the meat courses in this restaurant"
"She opted for the job on the East coast"

means.word_mean: 3. see fit or proper to act in a certain way; decide to act in a certain way;

sentences.sentence: "She chose not to attend classes and now she failed the exam"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cēosan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch kiezen

sentences.cn: 这就是外界调控进行的社会治疗带来的问题：在现实世界中，就像在学校里一样，我们都会坚持选择自己的朋友。
sentences.en: And that’s the problem with a social cure engineered from the outside: in the  real world, as in school, we insist on choosing our own friends.

sentences.cn: 如果微软此举的目的是想要激怒几乎全靠广告业务来盈利的谷歌，那么它选择的这种方法则不够直接：没有人能够保证将“不跟踪”设置为默认项会成为行业规范。
sentences.en: If it is trying to upset Google, which relies almost wholly on advertising, it has chosen an indirect method: there is no guarantee that DNT by default will become the norm.

sentences.cn: 这里面可能有很多机制的共同作用，促使我们选择基因相似的朋友，而不是为了利益，选择具有“实用关系”的朋友。
sentences.en: There could be many mechanisms working together that drive us in choosing genetically similar friends rather than functional kinship" of being friends with benefits!

sentences.cn: 因为：“人虽然创造了自己的历史，但并不是依照自己所想而创；他们并非在由自己选择的环境下创造出历史，而是从过去直接了解、给予和传承的环境中创造出历史。”
sentences.en: For: “Men make their own history, but they do not make it just as they please; they do not make it under circumstances chosen by themselves, but under circumstances directly found, given and transmitted from the past.”

sentences.cn: 在最后一项实验中，参与者们被鼓励去预测自己在观看一张使人不舒服的图片后的感受，事实上他们不太可能会选择看这样的图片
sentences.en: In a final experiment, participants who were encouraged to predict how they would feel after viewing an unpleasant picture were less likely to choose to see such an image.

sentences.cn: 选择这一称呼的原因是它呼应了种族群体，例如“意大利裔美国人”和“爱尔兰裔美国人”，这些称呼都已经不带有种族歧视色彩了。
sentences.en: This one was chosen because it  echoed the labels of groups, such as  “ Italian Americans ” and  “ Irish Americans, ” that had already been freed of widespread discrimination.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 由于食宿费很高，他家离学校很近，他选择住在家里，并且每周在完成全日制课程的同时打工 30 到 40 个小时。
sentences.en: Given the high price of room and board and the closeness of the school to his family, he chose to live at home and worked between 30 and 40 hours a week while taking a full class schedule.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.en: As a former high school teacher, I saw students choose familiar,

sentences.cn: 他们选择了有较低入学标准的社区学院或公立学校，而非完全跳过高等教育。
sentences.en: Instead of  skipping out on higher education altogether, they chose community colleges or state schools with low  bars for  admittance.

sentences.cn: 实际上，正被起草的新方针或许会带来一个结果：医生根据花费来选择药品，乃至认定某种疗法（比如，在临终阶段）过于昂贵。
sentences.en: In practical terms, the new  guidelines being develop could result in doctors choosing one drug over another for cost reasons or even deciding that a particular treatment — at the end of life, for example — is too expensive.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当我们让青少年选一个心目中的英雄时，他们通常会选择一个年长的家庭成员，而不是什么遥不可及的公众人物。
sentences.en: When we ask teens to choose a hero, they usually select an older family member rather than a remote public figure.

sentences.cn: 参众两院的议案都提出建立医疗保险交易所，小企业和个人可以在该处从大量私人保险计划中进行选择，有可能的话也可以选择公共计划。
sentences.en: The bills in both chambers would create health insurance exchanges on which small businesses and individuals could choose from an array of private plans and possibly a public option.

sentences.cn: 所以，我们要么让纳税人承担学生的学费，而代价是让他们指定学生学习的内容。要么我们就让学生自己选择专业，但同时也要自己支付教育费用。不过说到底，以下二者必有一个是正确的：
sentences.en: So we can have taxpayers pick up students’ tuition in exchange for dictating what those students will study. Or we can allow students both to choose their majors and pay for their education themselves. But in the end, one of two things is true:
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 确实，如果整体雇用人数增多，那就意味着我们所能选择（或是竞争） 的工作岗位也就越多。
sentences.en: It’s true that if total employment were higher, it would mean more jobs for all of us to choose from (and compete for).

sentences.cn: 更有趣的是，承诺将来会有奖励也足以让成年人选择分量更小的那份。
sentences.en: Even more interesting is that the promise of a future reward was enough to make adults choose the smaller portion.

sentences.cn: 他们选择追求目标，而不是安逸生活——有明确的目标意识甚至能降低患上阿尔茨海默病的风险。
sentences.en: They choose purpose over happiness—having a clear sense of purpose even reduces the risk of Alzheimer’s disease.

sentences.cn: 但是在那之后，调查对象并不确定这一代人是会追随父母一辈的脚步搬到郊区生活，还是会选择继续留在市中心。
sentences.en: After that, survey respondents disagree over whether this generation will follow in their parents’ footsteps, moving to the suburbs to raise families, or will choose to remain in the city center.

sentences.en: If our company and another has employ you together, how would you choose?

sentences.en: But researchers now that birds can see them and that they choose foods containing them.

Sentence.sentence: They choose purpose over happiness—having a clear sense of purpose even reduces the risk of Alzheimer's disease.
Penny-pinching UK consumers choose cheaper products from discounters such as Aldi and Lidl rather than luxury alternatives.

Bill, for instance, often gets painful flashbacks, in which unwanted memories intrude into his consciousness, but overall he has chosen to see it as the best way of avoiding repeating the same mistakes.
After that, survey respondents disagree over whether this generation will follow in their parents' footsteps, moving to the suburbs to raise families, or will choose to remain in the city center.
The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home.
The researchers, led by Martin Reimann, carried out a series of experiments to see if people would choose a smaller meal if it was paired with a non-food item.
Most kids and adults would choose a smaller meal that came with a non-food item.
Even more interesting is that the promise of a future reward was enough to make adults choose the smaller portion.
Adults chose the smaller portion on the mere promise of a future award.
The name Healthy Choice was chosen for the positive implication it held for consumers.

"There are a lot of studies on the relationship between breakfast eating and possible health outcomes, but this may be because those who eat breakfast choose to habitually have health-enhancing behaviours such as regular exercise and not smoking," she say
